items.sentence: Tom made a ham sandwich for himself and a peanut butter and jelly sandwich for Mary.
Lola the cow, Lola the cow, she's smart and she brings trouble, and she goes mooooo.
Tom has three sisters. One lives in Australia and the other two live in New Zealand.
Tom noted in his report that the stock market was a factor in the company's failure.
Tom's dog slipped its leash again and almost attacked one of those tiny, yappy dogs.
